overview: A short film about the contemptuous underground disco king T-SKrrt. Disco has officially been outlawed by the passing of the 28th amendment. A band of rag tag teens form a militia in favor of this musical revision, spending their free time hunting down the infamous T-SKrrt. Agent Bong leads this treacherous trek, scouring the local high school and mall. Will they be able to take down the man on the move or will they find their squad infiltrated with boogie-loving brothers?
title: The Disco Effect
